I had to download this video to see if this video was actually 4:3. It was. Yes this idiot has actually cropped this perfectly good 16:9 to be 4:3 so as "formatted to fit your TV" as is quoted at the start. Well, fuckwit my TV and about another 6 billion on the planet havent been 4:3 for about 5 years.

I don't know how you did it but this movie looks great on a Full HD TV Good work. This movie is too old and still you keep the good quality and sound. The only thing was a strange line at the right side but not big deal. Thanks man nice work!!
